mapper.select: select ss.ordernumber,ss.region_name as scenicName,ss.id scenicId, trunc( a.num/ral.LEVEL1_NUM,3)*100 yuZhi, nvl(a.num,0) as touristNum, case when a.num<ral.level4_num then '0' when a.num<ral.level3_num then '1' when a.num<ral.level2_num then '2' when a.num<ral.level1_num then '3' when a.num>=ral.level1_num then '4' else '0' end as color,ral.level1_num as max from region_alarm_level ral right join (select s.id ,nvl(sum(stay_tourists),0) as num,s.region_name from region_cfg s left join region_realtime_sum r on r.region_id=s.id where r.stat_hour=(select max(stat_hour) from region_realtime_sum ) group by s.id,s.region_name)a on ral.region_id=a.id right join region_cfg ss on ral.region_id=ss.id order by ordernumber,yuzhi desc,num desc

select tt.color,count(1) as num from ( select ss.region_name as scenicName,ss.id scenicId, case when a.num<ral.level4_num then trunc(a.num/ral.level4_num*0.25,2)*100 when a.num<ral.level3_num then trunc((a.num-ral.level4_num)/(ral.level3_num-ral.level4_num)*0.25+0.25,2)*100 when a.num<ral.level2_num then trunc((a.num-ral.level3_num)/(ral.level2_num-ral.level3_num)*0.25+0.5,2)*100 when a.num<ral.level1_num then trunc((a.num-ral.level2_num)/(ral.level1_num-ral.level2_num)*0.25+0.75,2)*100 when a.num>=ral.level1_num then trunc(a.num/ral.level1_num,2)*100 else 0 end as yuZhi, nvl(a.num,0) as touristNum, case when a.num<ral.level4_num then '0' when a.num<ral.level3_num then '1' when a.num<ral.level2_num then '2' when a.num<ral.level1_num then '3' when a.num>=ral.level1_num then '4' else '0' end as color,ral.level1_num as max from region_alarm_level ral right join (select s.id ,nvl(sum(stay_tourists),0) as num,s.region_name from region_cfg s left join region_realtime_sum r on r.region_id=s.id where r.stat_hour=(select max(stat_hour) from region_realtime_sum ) group by s.id,s.region_name)a on ral.region_id=a.id right join region_cfg ss on ral.region_id=ss.id order by yuzhi desc,num desc) tt group by tt.color order by tt.color
